Mansione.it: Musicista e artista web3 dal 2018, co-fondatore di SpaghettETH. Ha collaborato con Livepeer, Remix IDE, Stake Capital, Rekt e StableSummit.
Mansione.en: Musician and web3 artist since 2018, co-founder of SpaghettETH. Collaborated with Livepeer, Remix IDE, Stake Capital, Rekt, and StableSummit.

Mansione.it: Growth Lead a kpk. In precedenza Growth Lead a Pareto, ricercatore accademico e banchiere presso Citi.
Mansione.en: Growth Lead at kpk. Previously Growth Lead at Pareto, academic researcher and banker at Citi.

Mansione.it: VP Strategy presso Hype, agenzia di marketing crypto. Attiva nel marketing DeFi dal 2018, ha lavorato con Summer.Finance, Balancer, MakerDAO e Aave.
Mansione.en: VP Strategy at Hype, a crypto marketing agency. Active in DeFi marketing since 2018, with experience at Summer.Finance, Balancer, MakerDAO, and Aave.

Mansione.it: Product Lead presso P2P.org, dove sviluppa infrastrutture per l'accesso istituzionale agli asset digitali e gestisce oltre $7B in TVL. Co-fondatore di Woop e contributor in DAOs come Index Coop e Developer DAO.
Mansione.en: Product Lead at P2P.org, building infrastructure for institutional access to digital assets and managing over $7B in TVL. Co-founder of Woop and contributor to DAOs such as Index Coop and Developer DAO.

Mansione.it: Product presso builders_garden e host di un hub web3 a Roma con urbeEth e ETHRome.
Mansione.en: Product at builders_garden and host of a web3 hub in Rome with urbeEth and ETHRome.

Mansione.it: DAO Facilitator e Governance Specialist presso Routescan.
Mansione.en: DAO Facilitator and Governance Specialist at Routescan.

Mansione.it: Executive Manager presso UniCrypto, la prima community nazionale di studenti in Italia appassionati al Web3 e alla blockchain.
Mansione.en: Executive Manager at UniCrypto, the first national community of students in Italy passionate about Web3 and blockchain.
